name: Searing Arrows
desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Mortal Strike
desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge.

name: Shackleshot
desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

name: Vengeance Aura
desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If an allied hero is slain under the aura, an illusion of your allied hero will be created to fight for that hero.

name: Poison Sting
desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

name: Weave
desc: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.

name: Mana Break
desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

name: Stone Gaze
desc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

name: Caustic Finale
desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.
